productVision: Integrated ERP system for mid-size manufacturing company covering inventory management, order processing, production planning, accounting, and reporting. Replace legacy systems with modern cloud-based solution.

requirements: Code reviewed by at least 2 senior developers
No critical or high security vulnerabilities

backlogItems.title: Inventory Management - Core Module
backlogItems.userStory: As a warehouse manager, I want to track inventory levels in real-time, so that I can prevent stockouts and optimize ordering
acceptanceCriteria: View current inventory levels by location
Set reorder points and get alerts

backlogItems.title: Purchase Order Management
backlogItems.userStory: As a purchasing manager, I want to create and manage purchase orders, so that I can procure materials efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Create PO from requisition or manually
Send PO to supplier via email

backlogItems.title: Sales Order Processing
backlogItems.userStory: As a sales representative, I want to create sales orders and track fulfillment, so that I can serve customers efficiently
acceptanceCriteria: Create sales order with line items

backlogItems.title: Production Planning and Scheduling
backlogItems.userStory: As a production planner, I want to schedule production runs based on orders and capacity, so that we meet delivery commitments
acceptanceCriteria: View production capacity by work center
Create production orders from sales orders

backlogItems.title: Financial Accounting Integration
backlogItems.userStory: As a controller, I want all transactions to post to the general ledger automatically, so that financial statements are accurate and timely
acceptanceCriteria: Financial reports (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow)

backlogItems.title: Customer and Supplier Master Data
backlogItems.userStory: As a data manager, I want to maintain accurate customer and supplier information, so that all modules have consistent data

backlogItems.title: Role-Based Access Control and Security
backlogItems.userStory: As a system administrator, I want to control user access by role, so that sensitive data is protected
acceptanceCriteria: Audit log of all data changes

backlogItems.title: Business Intelligence and Reporting
backlogItems.userStory: As an executive, I want to view KPIs and reports with drill-down capability, so that I can make data-driven decisions
